ygData.subject: Gnomes and their faction problem
ygData.msgSnippet: Any gnomes out there that  can help me with this? Does killing gnome skeletons really hurt your faction with your guild that much? I sure as hell don t wanna
ygData.messageBody:
Any gnomes out there that can help me with this? Does killing gnome
skeletons really hurt your faction with your guild that much? I sure as
hell don't wanna buy my bone chips and not just kill them myself. Also,
does the faction hit only work on the decaying gnome skeletons in the
Ak'anon area, or is it all over Norrath? I hope this faction hit
doesn't make getting items harder than it already is. If anyone can
help me with this, please drop me a line.

Fleshridden Level 5 Gnome/Necromancer of Cazic-Thule
(Also known as Farken Bloodlust from Funny Everquest Screen Shots)
